home.name: Sergiu George Pop
home.p1: I am a web developer from Romania and currently living in Bihor county. I enjoy building everything from small business sites to rich interactive web apps. If you are a business seeking a web presence or an employer you can get in touch with me in the Contact section or clicking on the button bellow.
home.p2: After 10 years of working as a mechanical engineer, working in both 2D and 3D design, being delegated for months at a time abroad, and managing a 3 month long project coordinating up to 10 people, I have decided to shift my focus on what I've always been passionate about, telling computers what to do and how to think.
home.e-mail: Click here to contact me directly via e-mail

projects.clock: Keep track of your time studying, and when to take a break.
projects.calculator: Working Calculator built from scratch using JavaScript
projects.piano: Keyboard and Mouse activated drum machine

contact.title: Get in touch!
contact.hiring_text: Let's discuss your project requirements, goals, and timeline. I'm excited to collaborate and create something amazing together.
contact.contracting_text: Need a reliable developer for a specific task or ongoing support? Look no furtherâ€”I'm here to assist.
